text: Rui Ebata is a Japanese kickboxer and Muay Thai fighter, fighting out of Tokyo, Japan. ==Titles and accomplishments== Professional * 2011 SNKA Bantamweight Championhttps://efight.jp/result-20110724_16573 * * 2014 WKBA World Super Bantamweight Championhttps://efight.jp/result-20140309_28870 * * 2019 KING OF KNOCK OUT Super Bantamweight Championhttps://efight.jp/result_s-20190818_349440 ==Fight record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
